Service Details: Provides transit service within the Central Okanagan communities of Lake Country, Kelowna, West Kelowna, West Bank First Nations and Peachland
Cost: Please visit the website, call the bus hotline or pick up a transit Rider's Guide on any local bus for ticket pricing or scheduling details
